full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAS PA'I BSTAN BCOS TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL GYI TSIG LE'UR BYAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @078A *, ,TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL GYI TSIG LE'UR BYAS PA 'DI NI, YUL LHO PHYOGS KYI RGYUD DU BYUNG BA GZHUNG LUGS NGAN PA THAMS CAD CHES SHIN TU 'KHRUL BAR 'JUG PA SNYAN PA'I GRAGS PAS SA'I STENG MA LUS PAR KHYAB PA 'GRAN ZLA MED PA'I MKHAS PA CHEN PO DPAL CHOS KYI GRAGS PAS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO, , ` RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SU BHU TI SHR'I SHAN TI DANG, BOD KYI LO TZTSA BA DGE SLONG DGE BA'I BLO GROS KYIS BSGYUR, DPAL LDAN DAM PA'I LAS LA MNGON DGES PA, ,SMAD MED CHE BA'I BDAG CAN RGYAL PO MCHOG ,DGE BA'I THUGS MNGA' DES PAS SKYONG BA, ,MI YI BDAG PO DBANG SDE'I BKAS BSKUL NAS, ,BRTZON LDAN LHAG PAR DPYOD LDAN 'CHANG PO DANG, ,NYAN PO RGOL DANG PHYIR RGOL DON NGES DANG, ,'BEL GTAM DGA' STON RGYA CHEN MYONG BA'I PHYIR, ,'DZAM GLING MKHAS PA'I RGYAN GYUR RGYAN 'DI BSGYUR, ,LTA NGAN KUN SEL GNYIS SU MED PA YI, ,DON DAM RNAM DPYOD LHUR LEN BSTAN BCOS 'DI, ,GZHUNG MANG DON DKA' BSGRUB PAR @078B DKA' NA YANG, ,'BRAS BU CHE PHYIR 'BAD PAR RIGS PA YIN, ,LOG PA'I RGYUN PHYOGS RJES SU GZHOL GYUR BA, ,LTA BA CHU BO BZLOG PAR DKA' MOD KYI, ,YANG DAG RIGS PAS LEGS PAR BRDA SPROD NA, ,'GA' YI YID LA CI STE 'BAB MI 'GYUR, ,SGRA DON GNYIS KA NYAMS SU BDER LON TE, ,MUN SPRUL GYIS NI MA BSLAD LEGS BSGYUR BA, ,SNGON GYI SGYUR BYED DAM PA DE DAG GI ,DRI TZAM BRO BA DA LTA KHO BOR ZAD, ,DPAL LDAN KHA CHE'I RIGS PA PA'I, ,GTZUG GI NOR BU SKAL LDAN NI, ,RGYAL PO ZHES BYA LA THOS NAS, ,BLO LDAN BZANG POS 'DI BSGYUR RO, ,GRONG KHYER CHEN PO DPE MED KYI SHAR PHYOGS NA YUL 'KHOR LO 'DZIN PA ZHES BYA BA GRUB PA'I GNAS SU GRAGS PA'I 'DABS, RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I ZHING ZHES BYA BAR, KHA CHE'I PAndI TA CHEN PO SKAL LDAN RGYAL PO DANG, BOD KYI LO TZTSA BA CHEN PO DGE SLONG BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYIS BSGYUR BA'O,, ,,DUS PHYIS SA'I STENG NA 'GRAN ZLA THAMS CAD DANG BRAL BA'I MKHAS PA BSOD SNYAMOS PA CHEN PO SH'AKYA SHR'I BHA TRA LA SOGS PA RNAMS DANG, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG POS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,CHOS KYI GRAGS PA'I GSUNG RAB DRI MA MED, ,RIGS PA'I MTHAR THUG TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL 'DI, ,SGRA DON JI BZHIN BLO YIS LEGS RTOGS NAS, ,STON PA GANGS CAN 'DI NA KHO BO TZAM, ,MANGGA LAm, ,
